title: After the Wreck, I Picked Myself Up, Spread My Wings, and Flew Away
description: Jenna Abbott separates her life into two before the wreck and after the wreck . Before the wreck, she was leading a normal life with her mom in suburban New York. After the wreck, she is alone, desperate to forget what happened that day on the bridge. Then Jenna meets Crow, and her life is once again turned upside down. He begins to break down the wall that Jenna has built around her emotions. But can she bring herself to face the memories she's tried so hard to erase?
author: Joyce Carol Oates
